title: Feature request., simple logging
author: neimanpinchas
body_snippet:
Feature request.

Save a simple log of connect disconnect times, for billing purposes

iterations.description: Valid feature request to log connection/disconnection timestamps for billing — useful audit trail that many remote management tools provide

notes:
AI triage (claude): Valid feature request to log connection/disconnection timestamps for billing — useful audit trail that many remote management tools provide
Approach: Hook into connection open/close events to write timestamped entries (connection name, protocol, host, connect/disconnect time) to a simple log file in the config directory; add an option in Settings to enable/disable connection logging
